document_data.name: Trobriand's Baleful Teleport
document_data.mainbody: '''''Trobriand's baleful teleport''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[conjuration]] [[spell]] that transported a target to a designated location.
document_data.Effects: A clear mental image of the target destination was vital to ensure the spell worked as intended.
document_data.Components: ''Trobriand's baleful teleport'' did not require [[spell component]]s of any kind to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was developed by [[Trobriand]] of [[Waterdeep]]. A ''[[staff of rejecting]]'' was able to cast this spell.
